references.paper_title: Latent-shift: Latent diffusion with temporal shift for efficient text-to-video generation
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel method for efficient text-to-video generation using latent diffusion models, which is a key technique used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets, addressing a key challenge in high-resolution video generation.

references.paper_title: Align your latents: High-resolution video synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents a method for high-resolution video synthesis using latent diffusion models, which is highly relevant to the current work's focus on improving video quality.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This paper explores the use of video generation models as world simulators, which is a relevant area of research for the current work's focus on improving video generation capabilities.

references.paper_title: Animating general image with large visual motion model
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for animating general images, which is a related task to the current work's focus on image animation.
